sentences.en: About 40% of all students entering as freshmen graduate within 4 years.
sentences.cn: 所有入学新生中约有40%在4年内毕业。

sentences.en: About one - fifth of the freshmen reported that they had been brought up in small towns.
sentences.cn: 大约有五分之一的一年级生是在小城镇长大的.

sentences.en: All the freshmen will undergo a medical examination.
sentences.cn: 所有新生都将接受体格检查.

sentences.en: Almost a third of the freshmen said they were working during the summer vacation.
sentences.cn: 几乎三分之一的一年级生说他们在暑假期间打工.

sentences.en: At 11 o'clock each morning thousands of freshmen and sophomores used to deploy over the campus.
sentences.cn: 每天早上十一点钟,数以千计的一、二年级学生在校园里各就各位.

sentences.en: Biology, physics, and chemistry have ruined many freshmen s grade point averages.
sentences.cn: 生物, 物理, 化学已经拉低了许多大学新声的平均成绩.

sentences.en: But over the next few months, one population will be at very high risk: college freshmen.
sentences.cn: 不过，在接下来的几个月里，有一群正处于这种高风险之中的人：大学新生。

sentences.en: Just'cause we are freshmen does not mean we are your slaves.
sentences.cn: 不一定我们是大一的就意味着受你差遣.

sentences.en: Many of us know how easy it is to gain a few pounds. But over the next few months, one population will be at very high risk: college freshmen.
sentences.cn: 我们都知道体重增加几磅是很容易的事。不过，在接下来的几个月里，有一群正处于这种高风险之中的人：大学新生。

sentences.en: The crisp air, the turning leaves invasion of prospective freshmen.
sentences.cn: 清新的空气, 枯萎的树叶,络绎不绝的准新生.

sentences.en: The freshmen always seem like vegetables.
sentences.cn: 新生看起来总像植物人.

sentences.en: The president was lecturing the freshmen.
They are the freshmen of the English Department.
This rule applies to freshmen only.
sentences.cn: 这条规则只适用于大学一年级学生.

sentences.en: Today s freshmen are more consumeristic and less idealistic.
sentences.cn: 今天的大学一年级学生较多注重消费而较少理想主义.

sentences.en: University freshmen get lots of razzing, but they like the initiation.
sentences.cn: 大一新生受各种嘲弄, 但是他们对这种入门经验甘之如饴.

sentences.en: We are freshmen and they are sophomores.
sentences.cn: 我们是一年级学生,他们是二年级学生.

sentences.en: We intend this news report as teaching material for freshmen.
sentences.cn: 我们打算把这篇新闻报道作为新生教材.

words.tran_cn: 大学一年级新生；新手（freshman的复数）

trans.tran_cn: （中学或大学的）一年级学生( freshman的名词复数 )
trans.tran_en: In the United States, a freshman is a student who is in his or her first year at a high school or college
